StartupInfoEnabled: The cheat mode is enabled , you can type cheats into the console to toggle cheat mode.
StartupInfoDisabled: The cheat mode is disabled , you can type cheats into the console to toggle cheat mode.
ToggleEnabled: The cheat mode is now enabled.
ToggleDisabled: The cheat mode is now disabled.
IlegalArgument: Ilegal argument. Use cheats on/off to switch the cheat mode or use cheats to toggle.
NotIngameException: Toggle failed, please do again when the game is already loaded.
